member.name: T:Wpf.ViewModels.Content.ShellViewModel
member.summary:
Base ViewModel for shell windows. Uses IContentState for observing navigation state and events. Uses IContentHost for actual window close operations.
Flow: 1. Content requests close via IContentControl.RequestClose() 2. This raises IContentState.CloseRequested event 3. Shell handles event, can cancel or allow 4. If allowed, Shell calls IContentHost.Close() to actually close

member.name: P:Wpf.ViewModels.Content.ShellViewModel.ContentState
member.summary: Content state for observing navigation (IContentState)

member.name: P:Wpf.ViewModels.Content.ShellViewModel.ContentHost
member.summary: Content host for close operations (IContentHost)

member.name: P:Wpf.ViewModels.Content.ShellViewModel.CurrentContent
member.summary: Current content ViewModel - bind to this in shell's ContentControl

member.name: P:Wpf.ViewModels.Content.ShellViewModel.CanGoBack
member.summary: Whether back navigation is available

member.name: P:Wpf.ViewModels.Content.ShellViewModel.HistoryDepth
member.summary: Navigation history depth

member.name: M:Wpf.ViewModels.Content.ShellViewModel.InitializeAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Initialize shell - override to set initial content

member.name: M:Wpf.ViewModels.Content.ShellViewModel.Close
member.summary: Close the shell window (calls IContentHost.Close)

member.name: M:Wpf.ViewModels.Content.ShellViewModel.CloseAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Close the shell window asynchronously

member.name: M:Wpf.ViewModels.Content.ShellViewModel.OnContentChanged(System.Object)
member.summary: Called when content changes - override to react

member.name: M:Wpf.ViewModels.Content.ShellViewModel.OnCloseRequested(System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Called when close is requested from content. Return true to allow close, false to cancel. Override to add confirmation dialog.

member.name: T:Wpf.ViewModels.Content.StepViewModel
member.summary:
Base ViewModel for workflow steps. Uses IContentControl for navigation and close requests.
IContentControl provides: - Navigation methods (NavigateTo, NavigateBack via derived interface) - Close request methods (RequestClose) - Navigation state (CanGoBack, HistoryDepth)

member.name: P:Wpf.ViewModels.Content.StepViewModel.ContentControl
member.summary: Content control for navigation and close requests

member.summary: Whether navigation to next step is allowed

member.name: P:Wpf.ViewModels.Content.StepViewModel.CanNavigateBack
member.summary: Whether navigation to previous step is allowed

member.name: P:Wpf.ViewModels.Content.StepViewModel.HistoryDepth
member.summary: Navigation history depth

member.summary: Request to close the host window/shell

member.summary: Request to close with confirmation dialog

member.summary: Request to close asynchronously

member.summary: Saves current step data before navigation

member.summary: Validates current step before navigation
